title: That's A No
text:
Got an offer
Lot’s to balance
Not a loafer
Just a timer
Can’t be bothered
Won’t break focus
Beautiful eyes
Chances arise

Spinning the top
Imagining
Always in spring
Time will reverse

Well that’s what the populace said
Well that’s a no from the fighter

A confession
A polite no
Such a foolish
Opportunist
Couldn’t help it
Wouldn’t give up
Beautiful hair
And no more chances

Top still spinning
Imagining
A perfect spring
Time decelerating

Well that’s what the populace said
Well that’s a no from the fighter
Never did ask for a lighter
Praying for a patient planner
